filters.unresolved-stor: assignee in ("Diego Minano Sanchez", "Juan Amezcua", "Rafael Sevilla Cuenca", "javier rey", "Carlos San Emeterio Villalain") AND resolution = Unresolved ORDER BY priority DESC, updated DESC
filters.unresolved-juan: assignee in ("Juan Amezcua") AND resolution = Unresolved ORDER BY priority DESC, updated DESC
